home.sliderDesc: Support for investment promotion information in Da Nang
home.investmentGuide_desc: InvestBot helps investors access key information on industrial zones, economic zones, and potential projects. It provides details on investment incentives, legal procedures, licensing, and business support. Investors can also find contact information for relevant agencies to streamline their investment process in Da Nang.

home.legalProcedures_desc: Investment incentives, taxes, and legal procedures.
home.investmentAssistance_desc: Business Licensing, Support, and Investment Assistance Contacts
